description: This course covers the fundamentals of real estate.  Topics include property types, market analysis, real estate management and development, brokerage and appraisal, legal and regulatory issues, and investment analysis. 3 credits.

Take ECON-200. 300 Level require 30 GRADED credits, or signatures of instructor and chair. ASBE majors and minors only. A 2.5 GPA in MATH 109, ECON 200, 201, and ACTG 210 and at least a 2.0 overall GPA in the major or minor is required for enrollment.
name: Principles of Real Estate
